siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

childMdx.excerpt: What tools do you use to illustrate? Primarily my brain and upper body limbs. With a little help from  Procreate  on an iPad Pro. I do a little colour and brightness editing in Photoshop as well, but…

inboundReferenceNotes.title: Why You Own an iPad and Still Can't Draw

childMdx.excerpt: I know plenty of intelligent and highly motivated folks who are dying to learn to draw. Some are so intent on their desire, they've gone out and bought themselves iPads. The other half are actively…
